Question
========
Fill in the blanks:

i. The ... of a point estimate indicates whether a parameter is systematically (in)correctly estimated. 
ii. The ... of a point estimate is a measure of how this estimate varies between samples.  

Answerlist
----------
* i: standard error, ii: bias.
* i: bias, ii: standard error.
* i: standard error, ii: standard error.
* i: bias, ii: bias.
